name: Juggle Cat
description:
A simple juggling game I made for the PICO-1K Jam. Move Juggle Cat using the arrow keys and bounce the white balls to keep them in the air, while avoiding the red bombs. The game tracks your highest score - can you beat my best of 46?

Juggle Cat clocks in at 614 compressed bytes, and only 978 characters in total! Despite this, I managed to cram in:

  • Balls that bounce differently depending on where they hit the paddle
  • A few sound effects
  • A persistent high score
